faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about NextDevTpl.

what.question: What is NextDevTpl?
what.answer: NextDevTpl is a production-ready starter kit for building SaaS applications with Next.js 15. It includes authentication, payments, database setup, and beautiful UI components out of the box.

tech.question: What technologies does it use?
tech.answer: NextDevTpl is built with Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS 4, Shadcn/UI, Drizzle ORM, and Better Auth. We use modern tools like Biome for linting and formatting.

typescript.question: Do I need to know TypeScript?
typescript.answer: While TypeScript knowledge is helpful, the codebase is well-documented and follows consistent patterns. You can learn as you go, and the strict type checking will help catch errors early.

commercial.question: Can I use it for commercial projects?
commercial.answer: Yes! All paid plans include a commercial license. You can use NextDevTpl to build and ship as many projects as you want.

support.question: What kind of support is included?
support.answer: All plans include access to our documentation and community Discord. Pro and Lifetime plans include priority support with direct access to the team.

updates.question: How often is it updated?
updates.answer: We release updates regularly to keep up with the latest Next.js features and security patches. Lifetime plan holders get all future updates included.

customize.question: Can I customize the UI?
customize.answer: Absolutely! The UI is built with Tailwind CSS and Shadcn/UI, making it fully customizable. You can modify colors, fonts, spacing, and components to match your brand.

refund.question: Is there a refund policy?
refund.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with NextDevTpl, contact us within 14 days of purchase for a full refund.

featureGrid.title: A Collection of Components Built With
featureGrid.subtitle: Everything you need to build modern web applications. Pre-configured and ready to use.

themes.title: Customizable Themes
themes.description: Beautiful, responsive themes built with Tailwind CSS. Easily customize colors, fonts, and styles.

auth.title: Authentication Ready
auth.description: Pre-built authentication with Better Auth. Support for social logins, magic links, and more.

fast.title: Blazing Fast
fast.description: Built on Next.js 15 with Turbopack. Optimized for performance with edge-ready architecture.

typeSafe.title: Type Safe
typeSafe.description: End-to-end TypeScript with strict mode. Catch errors before they reach production.

deploy.title: Multi-Platform Deploy
deploy.description: Deploy anywhere - Vercel, Netlify, AWS, or self-host. Works great on edge runtimes.

database.title: Database Agnostic
database.description: Use Drizzle ORM with PostgreSQL, MySQL, or SQLite. Easy migrations and type-safe queries.

dx.title: Developer Experience
dx.description: ESLint, Prettier, and Biome configured. Git hooks with Husky for code quality.

ai.title: AI Integration
ai.description: Ready-to-use AI components and hooks. OpenAI, Anthropic, and more supported.

production.title: Production Ready
production.description: SEO optimized, analytics ready, and fully accessible. Ship with confidence.

howItWorks.title: How to get started
howItWorks.subtitle: Get your project up and running in three simple steps.

clone.title: Clone the Repository
clone.description: Get started in seconds by cloning the repository. All dependencies and configurations are pre-setup.

configure.title: Configure Your Project
configure.description: Set up your environment variables, database connection, and authentication providers.

deploy.title: Deploy to Production
deploy.description: Push to your git provider and deploy instantly to Vercel, Netlify, or your preferred platform.

completion.title: You're all set!
completion.description: Start building your application with all the features included.

testimonials.title: Trusted by developers worldwide
testimonials.subtitle: See what developers are saying about their experience with NextDevTpl.

sarah.content: NextDevTpl saved me weeks of setup time. The authentication and payment integrations work flawlessly out of the box.

michael.content: The code quality is exceptional. It's clear that a lot of thought went into the architecture. Best investment I've made for my SaaS.

emily.content: I've tried many starter kits, but this one stands out. The documentation is comprehensive and the support is amazing.

david.content: Shipped my MVP in just 2 weeks. The pre-built components and patterns made development a breeze.

lisa.content: The Tailwind + Shadcn setup is perfect. Everything is customizable and the dark mode works beautifully.

james.content: Finally, a starter kit that uses modern best practices. TypeScript strict mode, proper error handling, and great DX.

Pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
Pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that works best for you. All plans include a 14-day free trial.
